post:
SupremeBytes, LLC is now back in stock with our OVZ-128 packages for just $12 a year!. Our OpenVZ servers have the following features included:

 * Server location: Los Angeles
 * All of the virtual servers come with at least 1000Mbps port speed
 * The servers are unmanaged, and you should manage it by your self, but we will help you as much as we can.
 * All of the Servers include 1 IPv4, and you can order more if you need.
 * Each server includes 2 IPv6 addresses (more at request)
 * Full native IPv6 support

**OVZ-128**  
RAM: 128MB  
Disk Space: 10 GB  
CPU Cores: 1  
Network Transfer: 256GB  
1 IPv4 | 2 IPv6  
$12/year  
Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=158  

Location: Quadranet's Los Angeles Penthouse  
OpenVZ with SolusVM Management  
Extra IPv4 Addresses are $1.00 monthly  

Questoins? sales@supremebytes.com

Test file/ip: http://vpstest-la.supremebytes.com/bigtest.tgz (162.216.224.14)
